content:
- 'Intent-Description': This intent describes the action of categorizing and arranging
    files in a systematic manner.
  'Id': 9a3afe99ce09419297af0
  'Intent-Name': Organize Files
  'Attribute':
    79dec4e2bcbb486687336:
      'Description': The criteria to sort the files in the folder.
      'Name': sort_by
    e29b54929c1a46b6bc99d:
      'Description': The type of files to be organized.
      'Name': file_type
      'Required-values':
      - doc
      - pdf
      - image
      - video
      - audio
      - excel
      - powerpoint
    f78490246edc4ec2936ef:
      'Description': The name of the folder where the files will be organized.
      'Name': folder_name
- 'Intent-Description': This intent describes the action of controlling and overseeing
    files and their organization and storage.
  'Id': 2879fceb97384908b1086
  'Intent-Name': Manage Files
  'Attribute':
    1dce0c6419684f65a17a7:
      'Description': The type of the file to be managed.
      'Name': file_type
      'Required-values':
      - doc
      - pdf
      - jpg
      - txt
      - csv
      - xls
    f95c83f904844e81a9510:
      'Description': The location where the file is stored.
      'Name': location
    ff9359a5555741b2a7cd3:
      'Description': The action to perform on the file.
      'Name': action
- 'Intent-Description': Identifying, diagnosing, and resolving issues that cause
    a system or application to fail or produce incorrect results.
  'Id': 526b8dec7fa7486d813ef
  'Intent-Name': Troubleshoot Errors
  'Attribute':
    42ce709499aa45e3b7af3:
      'Description': The type of operating system.
      'Name': os_type
      'Required-values':
      - Windows
      - macOS
      - Linux
      - Chrome OS
    59218c81b727499589ae9:
      'Description': The specific error code being encountered.
      'Name': error_code
    5b1be06e1e064e7e9a1f7:
      'Description': The version of the operating system.
      'Name': os_version
      'Required-values':
      - Windows 10
      - Windows 11
      - macOS Big Sur
      - macOS Monterey
      - Ubuntu 20.04
      - Ubuntu 21.10
      - Chrome OS 91
- 'Intent-Description': Identifying and resolving problems that arise when a software
    or hardware fails to work as expected due to incompatibility with other systems
    or devices. This intent excludes MSTeams software compatibility issues.
  'Id': 1cc7f2b2de6d41758e3f4
  'Intent-Name': Compatibility Issues
  'Attribute':
    75cae237f26b4c828e3c7:
      'Description': The version number of the operating system, software,
        or hardware causing compatibility issues.
      'Name': version_number
    774ffd9917f54ccc9d277:
      'Description': The name of the operating system causing compatibility
        issues.
      'Name': OS_name
    87d4844f77194a1a81d0d:
      'Description': The name of the hardware causing compatibility issues.
      'Name': hardware_name
      'Required-values':
      - Printer
      - Scanner
      - Camera
      - External Hard Drive
      - Router
      - Smartphone
      - Tablet
    ba75de017621463692365:
      'Description': The name of the software causing compatibility issues.
      'Name': software_name
- 'Intent-Description': his intent should be used if none of the other intents are a good match for the user utterance.
  'Id': 57982438991f42899d0gg49
  'Intent-Name': No Intent
